attributes.action: create a coalition Government during this economic struggle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The economy is struggling and the last thing the country needs is the politicians bickering over what to do. The country needs to be united and that nust start and the very top with the people who make the decisions.

A new board should be formed with the best economic poltical minds from all different parties sitting on it. This way the government can move forward with the best minds worling together not against each other.
